name: DiceOut
description:
Board games, a way to spend quality time with your loved ones and have fun but that is just one side of the story. Behind the laughs and smiles hides the abuse and pain of the board game pieces. 

Follow the journey of a dice as he escapes a very famous game board to join his beloved dice wife.

Dice out is a platformer game that you will not forget.

Controls :

  • Directional arrows : Move dede
  • CTRL : Dash
  • A : Roll the dice
